column1: Little Goat Diner////They squeezed us in on a Saturday night after spending an afternoon on the roof for goat-toberfest!  We ordered the braised beef sandwich (Los drowned) and fish tostadas. My oh my
column2: we will be back tomorrow. So good
column4: so good!  Thanks to Justin (from NJ) and crew (you can tell when the restaurant peeps have good training and great attitudes plus the love in the food is generous - but I digress) for some great food and authentic diner ambiance.
